text: I don't have an attitude problem, you have a problem with my attitude.
author: null

text: Be yourself, who else is better qualified?
author: Frank J. Giblin

text: I am who I am, your approval is not needed.
author: null

text: A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances instead of your circumstances having power over you.
author: Joyce Meyer

text: I am not arguing, I'm just explaining why I am right.
author: null

text: You can't spell awesome without ME.
author: null

text: Life is too short to waste time on things that don't matter.
author: null

text: My attitude is based on how you treat me.
author: null

text: I'm not anti-social, I'm selectively social.
author: null

text: My attitude is a result of your actions.
author: null

text: Judge me when you are perfect.
author: null

text: I'm not arguing, I'm simply explaining why I'm right.
author: null

text: Attitude is everything, so pick a good one.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: Don't confuse my personality with my attitude. My personality is who I am, and my attitude depends on who you are.
author: null

text: I never lose, either I win or I learn.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Don't let someone dim your light, simply because it's shining in their eyes.
author: null

text: I don't have time to hate people who hate me because I'm too busy loving people who love me.
author: null

text: Love me or hate me, either way, I'm on your mind.
author: null

text: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: null

text: I'm the girl you'll never be.
author: null

text: Be the attitude you want to be around.
author: Tim DeTellis

text: Don't like my attitude? Call 1-800-Get-A-Life.
author: null

text: I don't have an attitude problem, I just carry a personality you can't handle.
author: null

text: I don't care what you think of me!
author: null

text: I'm too busy working on my own grass to notice if yours is greener.
author: null

text: A bad attitude is like a flat tire, you can't go anywhere until you change it.
author: null

text: I don't have a dirty mind, I have a sexy imagination.
author: null

text: I am not perfect, but I am limited edition.

text: You can either take me as I am or watch me as I leave.
author: null

text: I am not arguing, I am simply explaining why I am right.
author: null

text: Be a warrior, not a worrier.

text: My attitude is my unique gift.

text: Don't judge my choices if you don't understand my reasons.

text: I don't have an attitude problem. You have a problem with my attitude.

text: I don't have time for people who don't understand me.

text: Don't mistake my kindness for weakness.

text: I am not perfect but I am always myself.

text: I'm not always right, but I'm never wrong.
author: null

text: I'm not changing who I am, I'm just getting more of who I am.

text: I'm not stubborn, my way is just better.
author: null

text: My silence is my attitude.

text: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: null

text: I am not afraid to walk alone.
author: null

text: I am not a backup plan, and definitely not a second choice.

text: I'm not weird, I'm limited edition.

text: I'm not a second option, you either choose me or lose me.

text: I'm not sensitive, I'm selective about the people I let into my life.

text: I'm not rude, I'm just honest.

text: I'm not a snack, I'm a whole meal.
